snippet: Stocks declined after Japan did not offer new measures to calm its bond market, disappointing American investors who were also trying to gauge Federal Reserve policies.
lead_paragraph: Stocks declined after Japan did not offer new measures to calm its bond market, disappointing American investors who were also trying to gauge Federal Reserve policies.

headline.main: Wall Street Ends Lower on Central Bank Fears
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Ends Lower on Central Bank Fears
